text: Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Apex Legends and Starfield. The build quality of the ASUS TUF Gaming FX504GE-ES72 15.6" IPS Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti 8 GB Memory 256 GB SSD Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Gaming Laptop is solid, and the port selection is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

An average performer. The NVIDIA GTX 1050 is good, but I expected a bit more from the battery life on the ASUS TUF Gaming FX504GE-ES72 15.6" IPS Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti 8 GB Memory 256 GB SSD Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Gaming Laptop. It's a fair choice if you can get it on a good deal.

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Fortnite and Apex Legends. The build quality of the ASUS TUF Gaming FX504GE-ES72 15.6" IPS Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti 8 GB Memory 256 GB SSD Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Gaming Laptop is solid, and the screen brightness is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for AAA gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1050. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The screen brightness is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the ASUS TUF Gaming FX504GE-ES72 15.6" IPS Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti 8 GB Memory 256 GB SSD Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Gaming Laptop!

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Starfield and Valorant. The build quality of the ASUS TUF Gaming FX504GE-ES72 15.6" IPS Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti 8 GB Memory 256 GB SSD Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Gaming Laptop is solid, and the trackpad is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!
